ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: When they passed by them, they would wink at one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And winked at one another as they passed by them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: when they passed by them they winked,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: When passing by them, they would wink at one another
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And when the believers used to pass by, they used to gesture at each other with their eyes.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And, whenever they passed by them, used to wink one to another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And when they passed by them, they winked at one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: when them passed them by winking at one another,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And wink one to another when they passed them;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: when they passed by them, they would wink at one another;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And, when they passed them, to wink at each other,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and when they passed them by they would wink at each other,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And whenever they passed by them, used to wink at each other (in mockery);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And whenever they passed by them, used to wink one to another (in mockery);
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: and winked at one another as they passed them by.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And when they passed by them, they would wink at one another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And when they passed by them, they would exchange derisive glances.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [83:30] and when they, the believers, passed them by, they would wink at one another, the guilty beckoned with their eyebrows and eyelids towards the believers in mockery;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And wink one to another) they slander the believers (when they passed them) when the believers passed the disbelievers in their way to the Messenger of Allah (pbuh);
